snippet: Counterfeiting is a cottage industry in the Campania region, accounting for more than half of the 550,000 to 800,000 fake euro notes pulled from circulation annually by the central bank.
abstract: Giugliano In Campania Journal; counterfeiting in Campania region of southern Italy accounts for more than half of the 550,0000 to 800,000 fake euro notes pulled from circulation annually by European central banks; its most accomplished practitioners are found in and around Giuglano, where counterfeiting is a tradition that is often passed down from father to son.
